metadata.Title: CVE-2021-38207 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: drivers/net/ethernet/xilinx/ll_temac_main.c in the Linux kernel before5.12.13 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (bufferoverflow and lockup) by sending heavy network traffic for about tenminutes.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
